name: International Conference on Recycling and Waste Management
content: We are delighted to announce International Conference on Recycling and Waste Management which will be held during July 21-22, 2022 in London, UK. The main theme of our conference is â€œImportance of recycling the wastes on our earth ". Recycling Conference aims to bring together leading Prestigious Academics, Counselors, Recycling Experts, Environmental Scientists, Marine biologist, Oceanographer, Ecologists, Chemical researchers, Environmental engineers, Waste management researchers, Business entrepreneurs, Research scientists, Self-help group facilitators, Social workers, Teachers, Business delegates and Young researchers to gain and share about their experiences and research results aspects of Recycling and waste Management. Abstracts are welcome in all areas related to Recycling and Waste Management. For more information: https://recyclingconference.euroscicon.com/
